FuncDef:
The isis ldp-sync block command blocks LDP and IS-IS synchronization on an interface.
The undo isis ldp-sync block command restores the default LDP and IS-IS synchronization function.
By default, LDP and IS-IS synchronization is not blocked on an interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the ldp-sync enable command is run in an IGP process, the interfaces on which the neighbor status is Up run LDP-IGP synchronization. If the interfaces on a device carrying key services, ensure that the backup path does not pass through this device. In addition, you can block LDP-IGP synchronization on a specified interface of the device.
Precautions
The display isis ldp-sync interface command can be used to display information about an interface on which LDP and IS-IS synchronization is enabled.
